author: rcmatthews
msg: When dumping object details any exceptions are caught and added to the debug text, rather than just stopping the dump.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Debug options are shown when the 'Alt Gr' key is held down, rather than 'Ctrl' and 'Shift'

author: rcmatthews
msg: The Reload option has been removed from the object view menu. It is now availaible during debuging.
